text: Abeni is a 2006 Nigerian-Beninese film produced and directed by Tunde Kelani. ==Cast== *Kareem Adepoju as Baba Wande *Abdel Hakim Amzat as Akanni *Sola Asedeko as Abeni * Amzat Abdel Hakim as Akanni *Jide Kosoko *Bukky Wright ==References== ==External links== *Abeni at the Internet Movie Database *Mainframe site Category:Beninese films Category:Nigerian films Category:Best Sound Africa Movie Academy Award winners Category:Films directed by Tunde Kelani
title: Abeni (film)
